attributes.action: Reduce the retirement age to 65 i like 30 million workers demand we retire at 65
attributes.background: Reduce the retirement age to 65 and put more young people in work and take them off bennifits once you have worked 40 years you should be able to retire and get a full pension

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't clear if you mean the state pension age, or something else. It's also unclear what specific action you would like regarding benefits and work for young people.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
